attributes.additional_details: This goverment has let us down on matters such as , immigration, crime, and most importantly refusing to give the British public a referendum on quitting the the burden that is the the currupt E.U. I now demand that we are given a chance to show our disgust at the way this goverment rides roughshod over our democratic rights and I call upon M.Ps of all parties to call for a General Election now to enable the British public to vote for a party that will look after our interests first and not others.
